name: BLOWN SPEAKER
description:
Throw out your smooth sounding distortion pedal, and embrace the melting coil of the BLOWN SPEAKER.    With just two knobs, and two toggle switches, an incredible amount of sounds can be achieved from this single pedal.  Set the tone of your sound with the two toggle switches, BOOM and BAM.  Sculpt your sound even further using the SPLAT and LOUD knobs.  The SPLAT knob takes the sound from a nice full grit, to a splattering hot mess.  The LOUD knob is unique, in that after a certain point, it changes the texture and the dynamics of the sound. 

FEATURES:
● Handmade in Austin, Texas
● One year warranty.  See FAQ for additional information. 
● Unique LOUD knob (volume) that adds a different texture to the sound above a certain level
● SPLAT - introduces a splatter sound that is similar to a voice coil scraping a magnet
● BOOM - features three modes - 1. full frequency range 2. a high pass filter  3.  high pass filter with a harsher clipping sound 
● BAM - features three modes - 1. low gain 2. high gain, high pass 3. high gain
● True bypass switching
● Hand etched heavy duty die cast aluminum case
● Quality control tested through  burn in process
● Machined aluminum knobs
● High quality parts
● Numbered
● All discrete components
● Power supply - 9 volt dc 200 mA positive tip
● Dimensions - 4"x5"

● Click on VIDEOS tab at top of site to view demonstration.

name: THINGS FROM OUTERSPACE
description:
Want to take your sound to the outer reaches of space? THINGS FROM OUTERSPACE can get you there!  Selectable by using the DIODE stomp switch, choose between two led types, blue or red. Blue takes your sound to a open asymmetrical distortion. Red takes your sound to a compressed symmetrical distortion. Engage the BOOST stomp switch and send it to the edge of the galaxy!  Hold on!  A filter with a on/off switch is provided to blast the sound to a dimension that you will be able to use on your next creation! 

FEATURES:
● Handmade in Austin, Texas
● One year warranty.  See FAQ for additional information.
● Ability to switch between two different types of distortion-  an open sounding overdrive, and a full on distortion fuzz.
● Boost switch
● Features a filter to change harmonics and tone
● True bypass switching
● Hand etched heavy duty die cast aluminum case
● Quality control tested through  burn in process
● Machined aluminum knobs
● High quality parts
● Numbered
● All discrete components
● Power supply - 9 volt dc 200 mA positive tip
● Dimensions - 5"x6"

● Click on VIDEOS tab at top of site to view demonstration.
